description: Write query results to FASTQ format. Supports single-end, paired-end, and interleaved output.
Write query results to FASTA format. Supports single-end, paired-end, and interleaved output.
Write query results to SAM (text) alignment format. Supports optional headers with reference lengths.
example: COPY (SELECT * FROM read_alignments('input.bam')) TO 'output.sam' (FORMAT SAM, REFERENCE_LENGTHS 'refs');

description: Write query results to BAM (binary) alignment format. Headers are always required.
example: COPY (SELECT * FROM read_alignments('input.sam')) TO 'output.bam' (FORMAT BAM, REFERENCE_LENGTHS 'refs');

description: Write query results to BIOM (Biological Observation Matrix) HDF5 format. Automatic deduplication and sparse optimization.
example: COPY (SELECT * FROM woltka_ogu_per_sample(aln, sample_id, read_id)) TO 'table.biom' (FORMAT BIOM, COMPRESSION 'gzip');

description: Write query results to Newick phylogenetic tree format. Reconstructs tree from tabular node data.
